        value = words[i+1].lower()
        features[feature] = value
    return features

import re

def extract_features(review):
    features = []
    words = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', review)
    for i in range(0, len(words), 2):
        if i + 1 < len(words):
            feature = words[i] + ' ' + words[i + 1]
            features.append(feature)
    return features
